name: Emerald Order Cult Leader
description: A formidable humanoid figure embodying a mix of martial prowess and divine magic, known for its radiant weapon attacks and tactical leadership abilities.
memorable: Unique for its capacity to enhance allies' effectiveness in combat while also dealing significant radiant damage with its blessed weapon attacks.
goals: Leading a cult with strict adherence to personal beliefs and authority of its deity.
relations: Typically found with cult followers or other divine spellcasters.
environment: Often found in religious or cult centers, typically in areas of worship.
strengths: Possesses strong melee and spellcasting capabilities, as well as abilities that enhance its allies and improve its own survivability.
weaknesses: Lacks mobility compared to faster creatures, potentially making it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Wields a mace for bludgeoning and radiant damage, and can unleash a powerful Radiant Bolt.
most_powerful_ability: Blessed Weapons, which add significant radiant damage to its weapon attacks.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, allowing it to effectively notice details in low light.
skills: Proficient in Arcana, Deception, History, and Religion, showcasing a breadth of knowledge.
additional_information: Can grant allies an advantage on attack rolls with Prophetic Tactics.
Specializes in both support and damage dealing with divine magic.
Has access to a variety of spells for control and utility.
Utilizes Esoteric Vengeance to retaliate against attackers.
Enhances its AC significantly when unarmored due to Divine Blessing.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like Command, Detect Thoughts, Dimension Door, and Silence, primarily using Wisdom.
test_queries: humanoid that enhances allies in combat
cult leader known for tactical abilities
creature using spells and blessed weapons
